title: Zabbix
description: Network monitoring, server monitoring, SNMP, auto-discovery. Notable for being highly scalable, with an extensive plugin ecosystem.

title: Nagios
description: Host/service monitoring, alerting, plugin architecture. Notable for its mature ecosystem and being highly customizable.

title: PRTG Network Monitor
description: Sensor-based monitoring, drag-drop interface, auto-discovery. Notable for its user-friendly interface and being an all-in-one solution.

title: SolarWinds NPM
description: Network performance monitoring, topology mapping, advanced analytics. Notable for its enterprise-grade features and modular architecture.

title: ManageEngine OpManager
description: Network monitoring, server monitoring, workflow automation. Notable for offering cost-effective enterprise features.

title: New Relic
description: Full-stack observability, APM, real user monitoring, synthetic monitoring. Notable for being a comprehensive and developer-friendly platform.

title: AppDynamics
description: Business transaction monitoring, code-level diagnostics, AI-powered analytics. Notable for its business context correlation and enterprise focus.

title: Dynatrace
description: AI-powered monitoring, automated root cause analysis, full-stack observability. Notable for its Davis AI engine and automated problem detection.

title: Datadog
description: Unified observability, APM, infrastructure monitoring, log management. Notable for its 850+ integrations and unified platform.

title: Elastic APM
description: Distributed tracing, performance monitoring, integrates with ELK Stack. Notable for being part of the Elastic Stack and being cost-effective.

title: Grafana
description: Data visualization, dashboards, alerting, multi-source data. Notable for its visualization excellence and extensive data source support.

title: Prometheus
description: Metrics collection, time-series database, alerting. Notable for being a cloud-native monitoring CNCF project.

title: Jaeger
description: Distributed tracing, performance monitoring, root cause analysis. Notable for being a distributed tracing specialist and a CNCF project.

title: Honeycomb
description: High-cardinality observability, query-driven debugging, distributed tracing. Notable for its modern observability approach and high-cardinality data.

title: Middleware
description: Full-stack observability, AI querying, LLM monitoring. Notable for its AI-powered features and modern platform.

title: Pingdom
description: Uptime monitoring, synthetic monitoring, RUM, performance insights. Notable for its global monitoring network and being backed by SolarWinds.

title: UptimeRobot
description: Website monitoring, SSL monitoring, status pages, multi-location checks. Notable for its available free tier and simple setup.

title: Site24x7
description: Synthetic monitoring, uptime monitoring, APM, infrastructure monitoring. Notable for its comprehensive monitoring suite and 130+ monitoring locations.

title: Checkly
description: Monitoring as code, Playwright integration, API monitoring. Notable for being developer-centric with monitoring as code.

title: StatusCake
description: Uptime monitoring, page speed monitoring, virus scanning. Notable for its affordable pricing and virus scanning feature.

title: Splunk
description: Log analysis, SIEM, machine learning, real-time search. Notable for its enterprise security focus and powerful search capabilities.

title: Elastic Stack (ELK)
description: Log aggregation, search, visualization, real-time analytics. Notable for its open source flexibility and powerful search.

title: Fluentd
description: Log collection, data routing, plugin ecosystem. Notable for being a unified logging layer and a CNCF project.

title: Logz.io
description: ELK as a service, AI-powered insights, security analytics. Notable for being a managed ELK service with AI features.

title: AWS CloudWatch
description: AWS native monitoring, metrics, logs, alarms, dashboards. Notable for its native AWS integration and comprehensive AWS coverage.

title: Azure Monitor
description: Azure native monitoring, Log Analytics, Application Insights. Notable for its native Azure integration and KQL query language.

title: Google Cloud Monitoring
description: GCP native monitoring, custom metrics, alerting policies. Notable for its native GCP integration and machine learning insights.

title: Wiz
description: CNAPP, CSPM, agentless scanning, attack path analysis. Notable for its comprehensive cloud security and attack path visualization.

title: Prisma Cloud
description: CWPP, CSPM, compliance monitoring, threat detection. Notable for being a Palo Alto Networks platform with comprehensive security.

title: Aqua Security
description: Container security, runtime protection, compliance scanning. Notable for its container security focus and runtime protection.

title: CloudZero
description: Unit cost analysis, cost allocation without tags, anomaly detection. Notable for its tagless cost allocation and engineering-focus.

title: Finout
description: Virtual tagging, MegaBill, multi-cloud cost management. Notable for its virtual tagging technology and enterprise focus.

title: CloudHealth by VMware
description: Cost optimization, governance, policy management. Notable for its VMware integration and enterprise governance.

title: Flexera One
description: ITAM, software licensing, cloud cost management. Notable for its comprehensive IT asset management.

title: Synthetic Monitoring - Checkly
description: Monitoring as code, Playwright tests, API monitoring. Notable for its developer workflow integration.

title: Synthetic Monitoring - Datadog
description: Browser tests, API tests, mobile app testing. Notable for being part of the unified Datadog platform.

title: Ghost Inspector
description: Website testing, automated regression testing, CI/CD integration. Notable for its easy test creation and regression testing focus.
